20110113084107.000|20110113084108.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN FROM OHIO SEEK        
20110113084108.000|20110113084117.000|CC1|RECOGNITION?                    
20110113084117.000|20110113084118.000|CC1|MR. BOEHNER: I ASK FOR THE      
20110113084118.000|20110113084119.000|CC1|RESOLUTION AND ASK FOR ITS      
20110113084119.000|20110113084120.000|CC1|IMMEDIATE CONSIDERATION IN THE  
20110113084120.000|20110113084121.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110113084121.000|20110113084122.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: HOUSE  
20110113084122.000|20110113084123.000|CC1|RESOLUTION 32.                  
20110113084123.000|20110113084125.000|CC1|WHEREAS ON JANUARY 8, 2011, AN  
20110113084125.000|20110113084127.000|CC1|ARMED GUNMAN OPENED FIRE AT A   
20110113084127.000|20110113084129.000|CC1|CONGRESS ON YOUR CORNER EVENT   
20110113084129.000|20110113084131.000|CC1|HOSTED BY REPRESENTATIVE        
20110113084131.000|20110113084132.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS OF TUCSON,   
20110113084132.000|20110113084134.000|CC1|ARIZONA, KILLING SIX AND        
20110113084134.000|20110113084136.000|CC1|WOUNDING AT LEAST 14 OTHERS.    
20110113084136.000|20110113084138.000|CC1|WHEREAS CHRISTINA TAYLOR GREEN, 
20110113084138.000|20110113084143.000|CC1|DOROTHY MORRIS, JOHN ROHL, AND  
20110113084143.000|20110113084144.000|CC1|GABRIEL ZIMMERMAN LOST THEIR    
20110113084144.000|20110113084147.000|CC1|LIVES IN THIS ATTACK.           
20110113084147.000|20110113084148.000|CC1|WHEREAS CHRISTINA TAYLOR GREEN, 
20110113084148.000|20110113084149.000|CC1|A 9-YEAR-OLD DAUGHTER OF JOHN   
20110113084149.000|20110113084152.000|CC1|AND ROXANNE GREEN, WAS BORN ON  
20110113084152.000|20110113084154.000|CC1|SEPTEMBER 11, 2001, AND WAS A   
20110113084154.000|20110113084156.000|CC1|THIRD GRADER WITH AN AVID       
20110113084156.000|20110113084157.000|CC1|INTEREST IN GOVERNNT WHO WAS    
20110113084157.000|20110113084201.000|CC1|RECENTLY LEBLINGTED TO THE      
20110113084201.000|20110113084204.000|CC1|STUDENT COUNCIL IN MESA  VERDE  
20110113084204.000|20110113084205.000|CC1|ELEMENTARY SCHOOL.              
20110113084205.000|20110113084206.000|CC1|WHEREAS DOROTHY MORRIS ATTENDED 
20110113084206.000|20110113084208.000|CC1|THE JANUARY 8 EVENT WITH GEORGE,
20110113084208.000|20110113084210.000|CC1|HER HUSBAND OF OVER 50 YEARS,   
20110113084210.000|20110113084212.000|CC1|WITH WHOM SHE HAD TWO DAUGHTERS 
20110113084212.000|20110113084213.000|CC1|AND WHO WAS ALSO CRITICALLY     
20110113084213.000|20110113084215.000|CC1|INJURED AS HE TRIED TO SHIELD   
20110113084215.000|20110113084217.000|CC1|HER FROM THE SHOOTING.          
20110113084217.000|20110113084220.000|CC1|WHEREAS JOHN ROHL, A            
20110113084220.000|20110113084221.000|CC1|PENNSYLVANIA NATIVE WHO WAS 63  
20110113084221.000|20110113084223.000|CC1|YEARS OLD, BEGAN HIS            
20110113084223.000|20110113084225.000|CC1|PROFESSIONAL CAREER AS A BAILIFF
20110113084225.000|20110113084227.000|CC1|IN 1972, WAS APPOINTED TO THE   
20110113084227.000|20110113084228.000|CC1|FEDERAL BENCH IN 1991 AND BECAME
20110113084228.000|20110113084230.000|CC1|A CHIEF JUDGE FOR THE DISTRICT  
20110113084230.000|20110113084233.000|CC1|OF ARIZONA IN 2006 AND WAS A    
20110113084233.000|20110113084236.000|CC1|DEVOTED HUSBAND TO HIS WIFE,    
20110113084236.000|20110113084237.000|CC1|MARIE, FATHER TO HIS THREE SONS 
20110113084237.000|20110113084240.000|CC1|AND GRANDFATHER TO HIS FIVE     
20110113084240.000|20110113084241.000|CC1|GRANDCHILDREN.                  
20110113084241.000|20110113084242.000|CC1|WHEREAS PHYLLIS, A PROUD MOTHER 
20110113084242.000|20110113084245.000|CC1|OF THREE, GRANDMOTHER OF SEVEN, 
20110113084245.000|20110113084247.000|CC1|A GREAT-GRANDMOTHER FROM NEW    
20110113084247.000|20110113084249.000|CC1|JERSEY, WAS SPENDING THE WENTER 
20110113084249.000|20110113084252.000|CC1|IN ARIZONA AND WAS A 79-YEAR-OLD
20110113084252.000|20110113084254.000|CC1|CHURCH VOLUNTEER AND A NEW YORK 
20110113084254.000|20110113084255.000|CC1|GIANTS FAN.                     
20110113084255.000|20110113084300.000|CC1|WHEREASORWAN, A VOLUNTEER AT    
20110113084300.000|20110113084302.000|CC1|THE MOUNTAIN AVENUE CHURCH OF   
20110113084302.000|20110113084304.000|CC1|CHRIST, IS CREDITED WITH        
20110113084304.000|20110113084306.000|CC1|SHIELDING HIS WIFE, A LONG-TIME 
20110113084306.000|20110113084308.000|CC1|FRIEND WHOM HE MARRIED WHILE    
20110113084308.000|20110113084310.000|CC1|THEY WERE IN THEIR 60'S WHO WAS 
20110113084310.000|20110113084312.000|CC1|ALSO INJURED IN THE SHOOTING.   
20110113084312.000|20110113084314.000|CC1|WHEREAS GABRIEL MATTHEW         
20110113084314.000|20110113084315.000|CC1|ZIMMERMAN WHO WAS 30 YEARS OLD  
20110113084315.000|20110113084317.000|CC1|AND ENGAGED TO BE MARRIED SERVED
20110113084317.000|20110113084318.000|CC1|AS DIRECTOR OF COMMUNITY        
20110113084318.000|20110113084320.000|CC1|OUTREACH TO REPRESENTATIVE      
20110113084320.000|20110113084321.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS AND WAS A    
20110113084321.000|20110113084323.000|CC1|SOCIAL WORKER BEFORE SERVING    
20110113084323.000|20110113084326.000|CC1|WITH REPRESENTATIVE GIFFORDS.   
20110113084326.000|20110113084327.000|CC1|WHEREAS REPRESENTATIVE GABRIELLE
20110113084327.000|20110113084329.000|CC1|GIFFORDS WAS THE TARGET OF THIS 
20110113084329.000|20110113084331.000|CC1|ATTACK AND REMAINS IN CRITICAL  
20110113084331.000|20110113084333.000|CC1|CONDITION AT THE ARIZONA        
20110113084333.000|20110113084335.000|CC1|HOSPITAL.                       
20110113084335.000|20110113084336.000|CC1|WHEREAS 13 OTHERS WERE ALSO     
20110113084336.000|20110113084338.000|CC1|WOUNDED IN THE SHOOTING,        
20110113084338.000|20110113084340.000|CC1|INCLUDING RON BARBER AND PAMELA 
20110113084340.000|20110113084342.000|CC1|SIMON, BOTH STAFFERERS TO       
20110113084342.000|20110113084343.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GIFFORDAND       
20110113084343.000|20110113084345.000|CC1|WHEREAS SEVERAL INDIVUALS,      
20110113084345.000|20110113084348.000|CC1|INCLUDINPATRICIA MOSH, AMPLY    
20110113084348.000|20110113084349.000|CC1|-- ARMY COLONEL BILL BADGER,    
20110113084349.000|20110113084351.000|CC1|RETIRED, WHO WAS ALSO WOUNDED IN
20110113084351.000|20110113084356.000|CC1|THE SHOOTING, ROGER             
20110113084356.000|20110113084357.000|CC1|SCHULLINGBURG, AND DANIEL       
20110113084357.000|20110113084359.000|CC1|HERNANDEZ JR. HELPED APPREHEND  
20110113084359.000|20110113084402.000|CC1|THE GUNMAN AND ASSIST THE       
20110113084402.000|20110113084403.000|CC1|INJURED, THEREBY RISKING THEIR  
20110113084403.000|20110113084405.000|CC1|LIVES FOR THE SAFETY OF OTHERS  
20110113084405.000|20110113084407.000|CC1|AND SHALL BE COMMENDED FOR THEIR
20110113084407.000|20110113084408.000|CC1|BRAVERY.                        
20110113084408.000|20110113084409.000|CC1|NOW THEREFORE BE IT RESOLVED    
20110113084409.000|20110113084411.000|CC1|THAT THE HOUSE OF               
20110113084411.000|20110113084412.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES, ONE, CONDEMNS  
20110113084412.000|20110113084412.000|CC1|IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS 
20110113084412.000|20110113084414.000|CC1|THE HORRIFIC ATTACK WHICH       
20110113084414.000|20110113084416.000|CC1|OCCURRED AT THE CONGRESS ON YOUR
20110113084416.000|20110113084418.000|CC1|CORNER EVENT HOSTED BY          
20110113084418.000|20110113084419.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GABRIELLE        
20110113084419.000|20110113084421.000|CC1|GIFFORDS IN TUCSON, ARIZONA, ON 
20110113084421.000|20110113084424.000|CC1|JANUARY 8, 2011.                
20110113084424.000|20110113084426.000|CC1|TWO, OFFERS ITS HEARTFELT       
20110113084426.000|20110113084428.000|CC1|CONDENCES TO T FAMILIES,        
20110113084428.000|20110113084429.000|CC1|FRIENDS AND LOVED ONES OF THOSE 
20110113084429.000|20110113084432.000|CC1|WHO WERE KILLED IN THE AACK.    
20110113084432.000|20110113084434.000|CC1|THREE, EXPRESSES ITS HOPE FOR   
20110113084434.000|20110113084435.000|CC1|THE RAPID AND COMPLETE RECOVERY 
20110113084435.000|20110113084438.000|CC1|OF THOSE WOUNDED IN THE         
20110113084438.000|20110113084439.000|CC1|SHOOTING.                       
20110113084439.000|20110113084441.000|CC1|FOUR, HONORS THE MEMORY OF      
20110113084441.000|20110113084442.000|CC1|CHRISTINA TAYLOR GREEN, DOROTHY 
20110113084442.000|20110113084446.000|CC1|MORRIS, JOHN ROHL, PHYLLIS,     
20110113084446.000|20110113084448.000|CC1|DORWAN AND GABRIEL ZIMMERMAN.   
20110113084448.000|20110113084451.000|CC1|FIVE, APPLAUDS THE BRAVERY AND  
20110113084451.000|20110113084452.000|CC1|QUICK THINKING EXHIBITED BY     
20110113084452.000|20110113084455.000|CC1|THOSE INDIVIDUALS WHO PREVENTED 
20110113084455.000|20110113084457.000|CC1|THE GUNMAN FROM POTENTIALLY     
20110113084457.000|20110113084458.000|CC1|TAKING MORE LIVES AND HELPED TO 
20110113084458.000|20110113084500.000|CC1|SAVE THOSE WHO HAVE BEEN        
20110113084500.000|20110113084501.000|CC1|WOUNDED.                        
20110113084501.000|20110113084502.000|CC1|SIX, RECOGNIZING THE SERVICE OF 
20110113084502.000|20110113084504.000|CC1|THE FIRST RESPONDERS WHO RACED  
20110113084504.000|20110113084506.000|CC1|TO THE SCENE AND THE HEALTH CARE
20110113084506.000|20110113084507.000|CC1|PROFESSIONALS WHO ATTENDED TO   
20110113084507.000|20110113084509.000|CC1|THE VICTIMS ONCE THEY REACHED   
20110113084509.000|20110113084511.000|CC1|THE HOSPITAL.                   
20110113084511.000|20110113084513.000|CC1|WHOSE SERVICE AND SKILL SAVED   
20110113084513.000|20110113084514.000|CC1|LIVES.                          
20110113084514.000|20110113084515.000|CC1|SEVEN, REAFFIRMS THE BEDROCK    
20110113084515.000|20110113084518.000|CC1|PRINCIPLE OF AMERICAN DEMOCRACY 
20110113084518.000|20110113084518.000|CC1|AND REPRESENTATIVE GOVERNMENT   
20110113084518.000|20110113084520.000|CC1|WHICH IS MEMORIALIZED IN THE    
20110113084520.000|20110113084521.000|CC1|FIRST AMENDMENT OF THE          
20110113084521.000|20110113084523.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION AND WHICH          
20110113084523.000|20110113084524.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GABRIELLE        
20110113084524.000|20110113084525.000|CC1|GIFFORDS HERSELF READ IN THE    
20110113084525.000|20110113084527.000|CC1|HALL OF THE HOUSE OF            
20110113084527.000|20110113084530.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES ON JANUARY 6,   
20110113084530.000|20110113084532.000|CC1|2011, OF THE RIGHT OF THE PEOPLE
20110113084532.000|20110113084533.000|CC1|PEACEABLY TO ASSEMBLE AND TO    
20110113084533.000|20110113084535.000|CC1|PETITION THE GOVERNMENT FOR A   
20110113084535.000|20110113084537.000|CC1|REDRESS OF GRIEVANCES.          
20110113084537.000|20110113084539.000|CC1|EIGHT, STANDS FIRM IN ITS BELIEF
20110113084539.000|20110113084543.000|CC1|IN THE DEMOCRACY OF WHICH ALL   
20110113084543.000|20110113084543.000|CC1|CAN PARTICIPATE IN WHICH        
20110113084543.000|20110113084545.000|CC1|INTIMIDATION AND THREATS OF     
20110113084545.000|20110113084546.000|CC1|VIOLENCE CANNOT SILENCE THE     
20110113084546.000|20110113084549.000|CC1|VOICES OF ANY AMERICAN.         
20110113084549.000|20110113084550.000|CC1|NINE, HONORS THE SERVICE AND    
20110113084550.000|20110113084552.000|CC1|LEADERSHIP OF REPRESENTATIVE    
20110113084552.000|20110113084553.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS, A           
20110113084553.000|20110113084555.000|CC1|DISTINGUISHED MEMBER OF THIS    
20110113084555.000|20110113084558.000|CC1|HOUSE, AS SHE COURAGEOUSLY      
20110113084558.000|20110113084600.000|CC1|FIGHTS TO RECOVER AND, TEN, WHEN
20110113084600.000|20110113084602.000|CC1|ADJOURNING TODAY, SHALL DO SO   
20110113084602.000|20110113084603.000|CC1|OUT OF THE RESPECT TO THE       
20110113084603.000|20110113084608.000|CC1|VICTIMS OF THIS ATTACK.         
20110113084608.000|20110113084609.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE:        
20110113084609.000|20110113084610.000|CC1|PURSUANT TO THE ORDER OF THE    
20110113084610.000|20110113084611.000|CC1|HOUSE TODAY, THE RESOLUTION     
20110113084611.000|20110113084612.000|CC1|SHALL BE DEBATABLE FOR SIX      
20110113084612.000|20110113084613.000|CC1|HOURS, DIVIDED EQUALLY AND      
20110113084613.000|20110113084615.000|CC1|CONTROLLED BY THE MAJORITY      
20110113084615.000|20110113084616.000|CC1|LEADER AND THE MINORITY LEADER  
20110113084616.000|20110113084619.000|CC1|OR THEIR DESIGNEES.             
20110113084619.000|20110113084620.000|CC1|THE GENTLEMAN FROM VIRGINIA, MR.
20110113084620.000|20110113084621.000|CC1|CANTOR, AND THE GENTLEMAN FROM  
20110113084621.000|20110113084623.000|CC1|ARIZONA, MR. PASTOR, EACH WILL  
20110113084623.000|20110113084624.000|CC1|CONTROL THREE HOURS.            
20110113084624.000|20110113084626.000|CC1|THE CHAIR RECOGNIZES THE        
20110113084626.000|20110113084628.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN FROM VIRGINIA.        
20110113084628.000|20110113084628.000|CC1|MR. CANTOR: THANK YOU, MADAM    
20110113084628.000|20110113084629.000|CC1|SPEAKER.                        
20110113084629.000|20110113084631.000|CC1|MADAM SPEAKER, I YIELD ONE      
20110113084631.000|20110113084631.000|CC1|MINUTE TO THE SPEAKER OF THE    
20110113084631.000|20110113084632.000|CC1|HOUSE, THE GENTLEMAN FROM OHIO. 
20110113084632.000|20110113084634.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113084634.000|20110113084634.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN FROM OHIO, THE SPEAKER
20110113084634.000|20110113084636.000|CC1|OF THE HOUSE, IS RECOGNIZED FOR 
20110113084636.000|20110113084638.000|CC1|ONE MINUTE.                     
20110113084638.000|20110113084640.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER: MADAM SPEAKER, MY  
20110113084640.000|20110113084643.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES TODAY, WE ARE CALLED 
20110113084643.000|20110113084645.000|CC1|HERE TO MOURN.                  
20110113084645.000|20110113084647.000|CC1|AN UNSPEAKABLE ACT OF VIOLENCE  
20110113084647.000|20110113084649.000|CC1|HAS TAKEN SIX INNOCENT LIVES AND
20110113084649.000|20110113084652.000|CC1|LEFT SEVERAL MORE, INCLUDING OUR
20110113084652.000|20110113084654.000|CC1|COEAGUE, GABRIELLE GIFFORDS,    
20110113084654.000|20110113084657.000|CC1|BATTLING FOR THEIRS.            
20110113084657.000|20110113084700.000|CC1|THESE ARE DIFFICULT HOURS FOR   
20110113084700.000|20110113084701.000|CC1|OUR COUNTRY.                    
20110113084701.000|20110113084703.000|CC1|AMONG THE FALLEN IS GAVE        
20110113084703.000|20110113084705.000|CC1|ZIMMERMAN, A MEMBER OF          
20110113084705.000|20110113084706.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS' STAFF, A
20110113084706.000|20110113084709.000|CC1|PUBLIC SERVANT OF THE HIGHEST   
20110113084709.000|20110113084713.000|CC1|CALIBER, ONE OF OUR OWN.        
20110113084713.000|20110113084715.000|CC1|AND EVEN IN OUR SHOCK, WE ARE   
20110113084715.000|20110113084718.000|CC1|COMPOSED AND DETERMINED TO      
20110113084718.000|20110113084720.000|CC1|FULFILL OUR CALLING TO REPRESENT
20110113084720.000|20110113084723.000|CC1|OUR CONSTITUENTS.               
20110113084723.000|20110113084726.000|CC1|THIS IS THE GREAT CAUSE FOR     
20110113084726.000|20110113084732.000|CC1|WHICH GAVE GAVE HIS LIFE.       
20110113084732.000|20110113084733.000|CC1|WE SWORE AN OATH TO UPHOLD THE  
20110113084733.000|20110113084735.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION AND AT THE TIME OF 
20110113084735.000|20110113084738.000|CC1|THE ATTACK, HE WAS ENGAGED IN   
20110113084738.000|20110113084741.000|CC1|THE MOST SIMPLE AND DIRECT OF   
20110113084741.000|20110113084743.000|CC1|DEMOCRATIC RITUALS.             
20110113084743.000|20110113084745.000|CC1|LISTENING TO THE PEOPLE.        
20110113084745.000|20110113084747.000|CC1|LISTENING TO HIS NEIGHBORS.     
20110113084747.000|20110113084750.000|CC1|THE BRUTALITY THAT SHATTERED    
20110113084750.000|20110113084751.000|CC1|SATURDAY MORNING'S CALM WAS     
20110113084751.000|20110113084753.000|CC1|DEVASTATING BUT BRIEF.          
20110113084753.000|20110113084756.000|CC1|BRAVERY AND QUICK THINKING      
20110113084756.000|20110113084758.000|CC1|PREVENTED A LARGER MASSACRE.    
20110113084758.000|20110113084802.000|CC1|TURNING INNOCENT BYSTANDERS INTO
20110113084802.000|20110113084803.000|CC1|HEROES.                         
20110113084803.000|20110113084806.000|CC1|THE SERVICE AND SKILL OF FIRST  
20110113084806.000|20110113084808.000|CC1|RESPONDERS AND MEDICAL          
20110113084808.000|20110113084810.000|CC1|PROFESSIONALS SAVED LIVES.      
20110113084810.000|20110113084811.000|CC1|LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS ARE   
20110113084811.000|20110113084815.000|CC1|NOW WORKING TO ENSURE SWIFT     
20110113084815.000|20110113084816.000|CC1|JUSTICE.                        
20110113084816.000|20110113084817.000|CC1|LOOK TO TUCSON RIGHT NOW AND    
20110113084817.000|20110113084820.000|CC1|YOU'LL BE REMINDED THAT         
20110113084820.000|20110113084821.000|CC1|AMERICA'S MOST PLENTIFUL SOURCE 
20110113084821.000|20110113084823.000|CC1|OF WEALTH AND STRENGTH IS HER   
20110113084823.000|20110113084825.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110113084825.000|20110113084827.000|CC1|WE'RE THANKFUL, SO THANKFU      
20110113084827.000|20110113084829.000|CC1|THAT GABBY IS STILL WITH US AND 
20110113084829.000|20110113084831.000|CC1|WE'RE THANKFUL THAT TWO OF HER  
20110113084831.000|20110113084832.000|CC1|STAFFERS WHO WERE ALSO WOUNDED, 
20110113084832.000|20110113084835.000|CC1|RON BARBER AND PAM SIMMONS, ARE 
20110113084835.000|20110113084837.000|CC1|WITH US AS WELL.                
20110113084837.000|20110113084839.000|CC1|IN HER STEADY, GABBY'S STAFF HAS
20110113084839.000|20110113084841.000|CC1|PRESSED ON, OPENING FOR BUSINESS
20110113084841.000|20110113084842.000|CC1|MONDAY MORNING, RIGHT ON        
20110113084842.000|20110113084843.000|CC1|SCHEDULE.                       
20110113084843.000|20110113084847.000|CC1|AND THE MEN AND WOMEN WHO       
20110113084847.000|20110113084849.000|CC1|FAITHFULLY SERVED THE PEOPLE OF 
20110113084849.000|20110113084851.000|CC1|ARIZONA'S EIGHTH DISTRICT HAVE  
20110113084851.000|20110113084853.000|CC1|SIGNALED THAT NO ACT, NO MATTER 
20110113084853.000|20110113084857.000|CC1|HOW HEINOUS, WILL STOP US FROM  
20110113084857.000|20110113084859.000|CC1|DOING OUR DUTY AND BEING AMONG  
20110113084859.000|20110113084901.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE WE SERVE.            
20110113084901.000|20110113084904.000|CC1|AND TO ALL THE DEDICATED        
20110113084904.000|20110113084911.000|CC1|PROFESSIONALS THAT WE RELY ON TO
20110113084911.000|20110113084913.000|CC1|MAKE THIS INSTITUTION WORK, TO  
20110113084913.000|20110113084915.000|CC1|EACH OF YOU, THANK YOU FOR WHAT 
20110113084915.000|20110113084916.000|CC1|YOU DO.

20110113085904.000|20110113085906.000|CC1|HEARING DIRECTLY FROM THE MEN   
20110113085906.000|20110113085909.000|CC1|AND WOMEN SHE REPRESENTS.       
20110113085909.000|20110113085910.000|CC1|AMERICAN DEMOCRACY IS FOUNDED   
20110113085910.000|20110113085913.000|CC1|ON OUR MMITMENT TO A CONTEST    
20110113085913.000|20110113085915.000|CC1|OF IDEAS NOT VIOLENCE.          
20110113085915.000|20110113085917.000|CC1|POLITICAL DISAGREEMENT AND      
20110113085917.000|20110113085919.000|CC1|DISSENT MUST NEVER VIOLATE OUR  
20110113085919.000|20110113085921.000|CC1|NATION'S VALUES AS EXPRESSED IN 
20110113085921.000|20110113085925.000|CC1|THE CONSTITUTION, OF FREE       
20110113085925.000|20110113085926.000|CC1|EXPRESSION, SPEECH, AND         
20110113085926.000|20110113085928.000|CC1|PEACEFULSSEMBLY.                
20110113085928.000|20110113085930.000|CC1|GABBY SPOKE TO THAT RIGHT HERE  
20110113085930.000|20110113085932.000|CC1|FROM THE FLOOR LAST WEEK.       
20110113085932.000|20110113085934.000|CC1|IN THIS HOUR OF ANGUISH, WE     
20110113085934.000|20110113085937.000|CC1|SEEK RENEWED COMMITMENT TO      
20110113085937.000|20110113085939.000|CC1|HOPE, TO CIVILITY, TO PEACE     
20110113085939.000|20110113085942.000|CC1|AMONG THE AMERICAN PEOPL        
20110113085942.000|20110113085946.000|CC1|IN OUR -- MANY OF OUR CHURCHES  
20110113085946.000|20110113085948.000|CC1|WE SING ON SUNDAY AND OTHER     
20110113085948.000|20110113085950.000|CC1|DAYS OF THE WEEK, LETHERE BE    
20110113085950.000|20110113085953.000|CC1|PEACE ON EARTH AND LET IT BEGIN 
20110113085953.000|20110113085955.000|CC1|I GUESS WITH US, BUT WITH ME.   
20110113085955.000|20110113085958.000|CC1|WITH EACH OF US, WITHIN EACH OF 
20110113085958.000|20110113090000.000|CC1|US.                             
20110113090000.000|20110113090003.000|CC1|SPEAKING AS ONE HOUSE TODAY,    
20110113090003.000|20110113090005.000|CC1|COMINGOGETHER, PEACE WITH US,   
20110113090005.000|20110113090007.000|CC1|WE OFFER OUR THOUGHTS AND       
20110113090007.000|20110113090008.000|CC1|SUPPORT, OUR PRAYERS TTHE       
20110113090008.000|20110113090011.000|CC1|HEALTH OF OUR COLLEAGUE, GABBY, 
20110113090011.000|20110113090013.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE         
20110113090013.000|20110113090015.000|CC1|GIFFORDS, AND ALL OF THE        
20110113090015.000|20110113090015.000|CC1|INJURED.                        
20110113090015.000|20110113090017.000|CC1|WE SHARE THE STORIES, THE       
20110113090017.000|20110113090019.000|CC1|HEROES OF THE TRAMDY, AND MOURN 
20110113090019.000|20110113090022.000|CC1|THOSE WHO PERISHED.             
20110113090022.000|20110113090023.000|CC1|LET THEIR ACTIONS AND THEIR     
20110113090023.000|20110113090026.000|CC1|MEMORIES BE A BLESSING TO OUR   
20110113090026.000|20110113090029.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20110113090029.000|20110113090032.000|CC1|WE DON'T KNOW WHY GOD SAW THIS  
20110113090032.000|20110113090035.000|CC1|TO BE NECESSARY, BUT LET THIS   
20110113090035.000|20110113090038.000|CC1|BE SOMETHING THATE CHERISH AS   
20110113090038.000|20110113090042.000|CC1|AN OPPORTUNITY AS WE MOURN THE  
20110113090042.000|20110113090044.000|CC1|HEARTBREAKING HORROR OF IT ALL. 
20110113090044.000|20110113090048.000|CC1|THIS RESOLUTION IS FITTING      
20110113090048.000|20110113090049.000|CC1|TRIBUTE, GREAT RESOLUTION,      
20110113090049.000|20110113090050.000|CC1|PLEASE READ IT AGAIN AND AGAIN, 
20110113090050.000|20110113090053.000|CC1|CARRY THOSE NAMES IN YOUR       
20110113090053.000|20110113090053.000|CC1|HEART.                          
20110113090053.000|20110113090056.000|CC1|REMEMBER EACH OF THESE PEOPLE   
20110113090056.000|20110113090101.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF, AGAIN, A TRAGIC     
20110113090101.000|20110113090103.000|CC1|ACCIDENT TOOK LIVES, WOUNDED    
20110113090103.000|20110113090104.000|CC1|PEOPLE, IN THE FREE EXPRESSION  
20110113090104.000|20110113090106.000|CC1|OF IDEAS.                       
20110113090106.000|20110113090108.000|CC1|MAY THIS RESOLUTION REMIND US   
20110113090108.000|20110113090110.000|CC1|OF THE URGENT NEED TO UPHOLD    
20110113090110.000|20110113090112.000|CC1|OUR DEMOCRATIC VALUES, TO TREAT 
20110113090112.000|20110113090115.000|CC1|ONE ANOTHER WITH COURTESY AND   
20110113090115.000|20110113090118.000|CC1|WITH RESPECT, AND TO ACT AS     
20110113090118.000|20110113090119.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS HAS      
20110113090119.000|20110113090122.000|CC1|ALWAYS DONE AND ALWAYS DO, IN A 
20110113090122.000|20110113090123.000|CC1|MANNER THAT REFLECTS THE BEST

20110113090131.000|20110113090135.000|CC1|SPECIAL ATTENTION TO COMMANDER, 
20110113090135.000|20110113090139.000|CC1|CAPTAIN MARK KELLY, GABBY'S

20110113090223.000|20110113090225.000|CC1|TUCSON LASSATURDAY CAME AS A    
20110113090225.000|20110113090228.000|CC1|COMPLETE SHOCK, CASTING A PALL

20110113090241.000|20110113090244.000|CC1|THE REST OF THE VICTIMS.

20110113090246.000|20110113090249.000|CC1|DISTRICT WITH DISTITION AND     
20110113090249.000|20110113090250.000|CC1|THOUGHTFUL LEADERSHIP AND WE

20110113090255.000|20110113090256.000|CC1|SATURDAY'S COWARDLY CRIME WAS   
20110113090256.000|20110113090257.000|CC1|MORE THAN JUST AN ATTACK ON     
20110113090257.000|20110113090300.000|CC1|DOZENS OF INNOCENT AMERICANS AT 
20110113090300.000|20110113090301.000|CC1|A GROCERY STORE.

20110113090303.000|20110113090306.000|CC1|ESSENCE OF DEMOCRACY AND        
20110113090306.000|20110113090307.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GOVERNMENT.

20110113090710.000|20110113090713.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY IS A SADDER PLACE.    
20110113090713.000|20110113090713.000|CC1|BUT REPRESENTATIVE GIFFORDS'    
20110113090713.000|20110113090715.000|CC1|INTELLIGENCE AND TOUGHNESS, HER 
20110113090715.000|20110113090718.000|CC1|PUBLIC SPIRIT AND HER CHARM     
20110113090718.000|20110113090720.000|CC1|WILL, GOD WILLING, AND WITH THE 
20110113090720.000|20110113090721.000|CC1|EXTRAORDINARY MED EDCAL CARE SHE
20110113090721.000|20110113090723.000|CC1|IS RECEIVING -- MEDICAL CARE SHE
20110113090723.000|20110113090725.000|CC1|IS RECEIVING, SOON RETURN TO    
20110113090725.000|20110113090727.000|CC1|THIS BODY.                      
20110113090727.000|20110113090730.000|CC1|AND AGAIN BE A PRACTITIONER AND 
20110113090730.000|20110113090733.000|CC1|A MODEL FOR THE PRINCIPLES OF   
20110113090733.000|20110113090735.000|CC1|CIVIL DEBATE AND THOUGHTFUL     
20110113090735.000|20110113090738.000|CC1|DELIBERATION ON WHICH THIS      
20110113090738.000|20110113090742.000|CC1|TEMPLE IS FOUNDED.              
20110113090742.000|20110113090743.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS WAS      
20110113090743.000|20110113090745.000|CC1|ATTACKED DOING THE WORK THAT IS 
20110113090745.000|20110113090748.000|CC1|THE HEART OF DEMOCRACY AS HAS   
20110113090748.000|20110113090749.000|CC1|BEEN SO ELOQUENTLY OBSERVED BY  
20110113090749.000|20110113090754.000|CC1|OUR SPEAKER, MR. BOEHNER.       
20110113090754.000|20110113090757.000|CC1|LISTENING TO HER NEIGHBORS,     
20110113090757.000|20110113090758.000|CC1|LISTENING TO THOSE WHO SENT HER 
20110113090758.000|20110113090801.000|CC1|HERE TO WASHINGTON TO REFLT     
20110113090801.000|20110113090802.000|CC1|THEIR VIEWS.                    
20110113090802.000|20110113090804.000|CC1|EACH ONEF US HAVE DONE THAT     
20110113090804.000|20110113090806.000|CC1|WORK, EACH ONE OF US HAS COME   
20110113090806.000|20110113090809.000|CC1|BACK BEARING THEIR FEARS AND    
20110113090809.000|20110113090811.000|CC1|THEIR HOPES, THEIR CONVICTIONS  
20110113090811.000|20110113090813.000|CC1|AND THEIR VISIONS FOR THE       
20110113090813.000|20110113090814.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110113090814.000|20110113090817.000|CC1|SOME OF COURSE ARE EVERYDAY     
20110113090817.000|20110113090819.000|CC1|HOPES, SOME ARE MATTERS OF LIFE 
20110113090819.000|20110113090820.000|CC1|AND DEATH.                      
20110113090820.000|20110113090822.000|CC1|BUT IN EACH CASE WE BRING THESE 
20110113090822.000|20110113090825.000|CC1|HOPES HERE AND SPEAK TO OUR     
20110113090825.000|20110113090827.000|CC1|NEIGHBORS AS BEST WE CAN.       
20110113090827.000|20110113090828.000|CC1|THAT IS WHAT CONGRESSWOMAN      
20110113090828.000|20110113090830.000|CC1|GIFFORDS WAS DOING.             
20110113090830.000|20110113090833.000|CC1|WE DO NOT KNOW, OF COURSE, THE  
20110113090833.000|20110113090834.000|CC1|SPECIFIC MOTIVE WHICH LED THE   
20110113090834.000|20110113090837.000|CC1|PERPETRATOR OF THIS CRIME TO    
20110113090837.000|20110113090837.000|CC1|ACT.                            
20110113090837.000|20110113090840.000|CC1|NOR CAN WE DRAW CONCLUSIONS AS  
20110113090840.000|20110113090841.000|CC1|TO SPECIFIC CAUSES.             
20110113090841.000|20110113090844.000|CC1|BUT IT SEEMS TO ME IT IS A TIME 
20110113090844.000|20110113090848.000|CC1|FOR US TO REFLECT ON THE        
20110113090848.000|20110113090849.000|CC1|HEIGHTENED ANGER BEING PROJECTED
20110113090849.000|20110113090852.000|CC1|ON OUR PUBLIC DEBATE.           
20110113090852.000|20110113090853.000|CC1|AND THE DAILY DENIGRATION OF    
20110113090853.000|20110113090858.000|CC1|THOSE WITH WHOM WE DISAGREE AND 
20110113090858.000|20110113090859.000|CC1|IT IS APPROPRIATE THEREFORE THAT
20110113090859.000|20110113090902.000|CC1|THE WRENCHING, SHOCKING,        
20110113090902.000|20110113090904.000|CC1|SENSELESS VIOLENCE OF THAT DAY  
20110113090904.000|20110113090907.000|CC1|COMPEL US TO REFLECT ON OUR OWN 
20110113090907.000|20110113090909.000|CC1|REPRESENT -- RESPONSIBILITY TO  
20110113090909.000|20110113090912.000|CC1|TELL PER OUR WORDS -- TEMPER OUR
20110113090912.000|20110113090914.000|CC1|WORDS AND RCHT THOSE WITH WHOM  
20110113090914.000|20110113090916.000|CC1|WE DISAGREE.                    
20110113090916.000|20110113090918.000|CC1|LET THE FAILURE TO DO SO GIVE   
20110113090918.000|20110113090920.000|CC1|INCITEMENT TO THE ANGRIEST AND  
20110113090920.000|20110113090924.000|CC1|MOST UNSTABLE AMONG US.         
20110113090924.000|20110113090926.000|CC1|LET US SPEAK FOR OUR NEIGHBORS  
20110113090926.000|20110113090930.000|CC1|IN A SPIRIT OUNY.               
20110113090930.000|20110113090932.000|CC1|NOT A FALSE AND SHALLOW UNITY,  
20110113090932.000|20110113090935.000|CC1|NOT A UNITY THAT WISHES AWAY OUR
20110113090935.000|20110113090938.000|CC1|DIFFERENCES OR OUR DISCORDS, BUT
20110113090938.000|20110113090941.000|CC1|A UNITY FOUNDED ON OUR REVERENCE
20110113090941.000|20110113090945.000|CC1|FOR OUR DEMOCRACY'S MOST        
20110113090945.000|20110113090948.000|CC1|PRECIOUS, MOST FRANL ILGIFT, ITS
20110113090948.000|20110113090950.000|CC1|POWER -- FRAGILE GIFT, ITS POWER
20110113090950.000|20110113090954.000|CC1|TO RESOLVE WITHOUT VIOLENCE OUR 
20110113090954.000|20110113090955.000|CC1|QUESTIONS.                      
20110113090955.000|20110113090956.000|CC1|IN A MUCH DARKER TIME THAN OURS,
20110113090956.000|20110113091000.000|CC1|FROM THE EDGE OF A GREAT WAR,   
20110113091000.000|20110113091001.000|CC1|PRESIDENT LINCOLN ADDRESSED     
20110113091001.000|20110113091003.000|CC1|THESE WORDS TO THE MEN AND WOMEN
20110113091003.000|20110113091008.000|CC1|WHOM EVEN IN THE WAR'S DEPTH HE 
20110113091008.000|20110113091009.000|CC1|REFUSED TO SEE AS ANYTHING OTHER
20110113091009.000|20110113091014.000|CC1|AN HIS FELLOW AMERINS, HE       
20110113091014.000|20110113091017.000|CC1|SAID THIS, WE ARE NOT ENEMIES   
20110113091017.000|20110113091018.000|CC1|BUT FRIENDS.                    
20110113091018.000|20110113091020.000|CC1|WE MUST NOT BE ENEMIES, THOUGH  
20110113091020.000|20110113091024.000|CC1|PASSION MAY HAVE STRAINED, IT   
20110113091024.000|20110113091028.000|CC1|MUST NOT BREAK OUR BONDS OF     
20110113091028.000|20110113091029.000|CC1|AFFECTION.                      
20110113091029.000|20110113091030.000|CC1|THERE ARE IN EVERY SOCIETY AND  
20110113091030.000|20110113091032.000|CC1|IN EVERY CULTURE AND EVERY      
20110113091032.000|20110113091036.000|CC1|NATION THOSE WHO REFLECT THAT   
20110113091036.000|20110113091039.000|CC1|CEDE -- CREED, BUT IF WE LOVE   
20110113091039.000|20110113091042.000|CC1|OUR COUNTRY, IF WE HONOR OUR    
20110113091042.000|20110113091043.000|CC1|OATH TO COUNTRY, CONSTITUTION   
20110113091043.000|20110113091045.000|CC1|AND TO OUR NATION OF LAWS, WE   
20110113091045.000|20110113091049.000|CC1|MUST LIVE BY THOSE WORDS.       
20110113091049.000|20110113091051.000|CC1|THERE IS PERHAPS NOTHING WE CAN 
20110113091051.000|20110113091053.000|CC1|DO THAT WILL PREVENT THE        
20110113091053.000|20110113091056.000|CC1|MINDLESS VIOLENCE COMMITTED BY  
20110113091056.000|20110113091057.000|CC1|THE FEW.                        
20110113091057.000|20110113091101.000|CC1|BUT WE CAN AND MUST APPEAL TO   
20110113091101.000|20110113091105.000|CC1|THE BEST INSTINCTS OF THE MANY, 
20110113091105.000|20110113091107.000|CC1|TO THE FAMILIES OF THE FALLEN WE
20110113091107.000|20110113091109.000|CC1|EXTEND OUR SYMPATHY.            
20110113091109.000|20110113091112.000|CC1| THE SURVIVORS WE EXTEND OUR    
20110113091112.000|20110113091115.000|CC1|PRAYERS FOR A FULL AND SPEEDY   
20110113091115.000|20110113091116.000|CC1|RECOVERY.                       
20110113091116.000|20110113091121.000|CC1|AND TO OUR COLLEAGUE, TO OUR    
20110113091121.000|20110113091124.000|CC1|BELOVED COLLEAGUE, GABBY, WE    
20110113091124.000|20110113091125.000|CC1|EXTEND OUR LOVE, OUR HOPES FOR  
20110113091125.000|20110113091129.000|CC1|HER EARLY RETURN TO THE CHAMBER 
20110113091129.000|20110113091133.000|CC1|AND OUR RANKS.                  
20110113091133.000|20110113091138.000|CC1|ALL OF US IN THIS TIME HAVE COME
20110113091138.000|20110113091141.000|CC1|TOGETHER, REACHED OUT TO ONE    
20110113091141.000|20110113091143.000|CC1|ANOTHER, COMFORTED ONE ANOTHER  
20110113091143.000|20110113091148.000|CC1|AND LIFTED ONE ANOTHER UP.      
20110113091148.000|20110113091151.000|CC1|MAY THAT SENTIMENT NOT PASS     
20110113091151.000|20110113091154.000|CC1|QUICKLY FROM THIS BODY OR FROM  
20110113091154.000|20110113091154.000|CC1|THIS COUNTRY.                   
20110113091154.000|20110113091156.000|CC1|I YIELD BACK THE BALANCE OF MY  
20110113091156.000|20110113091157.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110113091157.000|20110113091158.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113091158.000|20110113091159.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN'S TIME HAS EXPIRED.   
20110113091159.000|20110113091201.000|CC1|THE GENTLEMAN FROM ARIZONA, MR. 
20110113091201.000|20110113091202.000|CC1|FLAKE.                          
20110113091202.000|20110113091203.000|CC1|MR. FLAKE: MADAM SPEAKER, I WANT
20110113091203.000|20110113091204.000|CC1|TO THANK SPEAKER BOEHNER AND THE
20110113091204.000|20110113091205.000|CC1|LEADERSHIP ON BOTH SIDES OF THE 
20110113091205.000|20110113091206.000|CC1|AISLE FOR BRINGING THIS         
20110113091206.000|20110113091207.000|CC1|RESOLUTION TO THE FLOOR.        
20110113091207.000|20110113091209.000|CC1|THIS IS INDEED CONGRESS AT ITS  
20110113091209.000|20110113091210.000|CC1|BEST.                           
20110113091210.000|20110113091213.000|CC1|NONE OF US WILL EVER FORGET THE 
20110113091213.000|20110113091214.000|CC1|FEELING WE HAD WHEN WE HEARD THE
20110113091214.000|20110113091216.000|CC1|NEWS OF THE SHOOTING LAST       
20110113091216.000|20110113091218.000|CC1|SATURDAY, ONE OF THE VICTIMS OF 
20110113091218.000|20110113091219.000|CC1|WHICH WAS OUR DEAR FRIEND D     
20110113091219.000|20110113091220.000|CC1|COLLEAGUE, GABRIELLE GIFFORDS.  
20110113091220.000|20110113091222.000|CC1|A FEW HOURS AFTER THE NEWS      
20110113091222.000|20110113091225.000|CC1|BROKE, I WAS IN ATTENDANCE AT   
20110113091225.000|20110113091226.000|CC1|THE PRESS CONFERENCE IN TUCSON  
20110113091226.000|20110113091229.000|CC1|AT THE MEDICAL CENTER, AMID THE 
20110113091229.000|20110113091231.000|CC1|RMOIL AND THE ANGUISH OF THE    
20110113091231.000|20110113091233.000|CC1|OCCASION THERE WERE AUDIBLE     
20110113091233.000|20110113091234.000|CC1|EXPRESONS OF JOY AND RELIEF IN  
20110113091234.000|20110113091235.000|CC1|THAT ROOM AND AROUND THE COUNTRY
20110113091235.000|20110113091237.000|CC1|WHEN THE DOCTOR ANNOUNCED THAT  
20110113091237.000|20110113091240.000|CC1|GABBY COULD LISTEN AND RESPOND. 
20110113091240.000|20110113091242.000|CC1|GABBY'S PROGRESS OVER THE PAST  
20110113091242.000|20110113091243.000|CC1|FEW DAYS HAS BEEN MEASURED IN   
20110113091243.000|20110113091245.000|CC1|MUCH THE SAME MANNER.           
20110113091245.000|20110113091247.000|CC1|THE SQUEEZE OF A HAND, THE      
20110113091247.000|20110113091249.000|CC1|RAISING OF TWO FINGERS, A THUMBS
20110113091249.000|20110113091249.000|CC1|UP SIGN.                        
20110113091249.000|20110113091252.000|CC1|EACH GESTURE LETTING US KNOW    
20110113091252.000|20110113091254.000|CC1|THAT SHE HEARS, THAT SHE IS     
20110113091254.000|20110113091255.000|CC1|LISTENING AND RESPONDING.       
20110113091255.000|20110113091257.000|CC1|THE TRAITS, LISTENING AND       
20110113091257.000|20110113091300.000|CC1|RESPONDING, HAVE DEFINED        
20110113091300.000|20110113091301.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS' CAREER AS A 
20110113091301.000|20110113091302.000|CC1|LEGISLATER.                     
20110113091302.000|20110113091304.000|CC1|LET ME GIVE BUT ONE EXAMPLE BORN
20110113091304.000|20110113091305.000|CC1|OF ANOTHER TRAGEDY JUST 10      
20110113091305.000|20110113091307.000|CC1|MONTHS AGO.                     
20110113091307.000|20110113091308.000|CC1|LONG-TIME ARIZONAN KNOWN TO     
20110113091308.000|20110113091310.000|CC1|PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THOSE HE  
20110113091310.000|20110113091312.000|CC1|FOUND IN NEED WAS MURDERED ON   
20110113091312.000|20110113091314.000|CC1|HIS RANCH NEAR ARIZONA'S        
20110113091314.000|20110113091315.000|CC1|SOUTHERN BORDER.                
20110113091315.000|20110113091316.000|CC1|FARMERS AND RANCHERS IN ARIZONA 
20110113091316.000|20110113091320.000|CC1|WERENDERSTANDABLY ALARMED.      
20110113091320.000|20110113091324.000|CC1|GABBY LISTENED AND RESPONDED    
20110113091324.000|20110113091325.000|CC1|OVER AND OVER SHE CONTACTED AND 
20110113091325.000|20110113091327.000|CC1|VISITED THOSE AFFECTED,         
20110113091327.000|20110113091328.000|CC1|REASSURING THEM THAT HELP WAS ON
20110113091328.000|20110113091329.000|CC1|ITS WAY.                        
20110113091329.000|20110113091330.000|CC1|SHE CONVENED MONTHLY CONFERENCE 
20110113091330.000|20110113091332.000|CC1|CALLS FOR THE FARMING AND       
20110113091332.000|20110113091332.000|CC1|RANCHING COMMUNITIES INVOLVING  
20110113091332.000|20110113091334.000|CC1|THE BORDER PATROL, IMMIGRATIONS 
20110113091334.000|20110113091336.000|CC1|AND CUSTOMS ENFORCEMENT AND     
20110113091336.000|20110113091337.000|CC1|JUSTICE DEPARTMENT AND OTHER    
20110113091337.000|20110113091338.000|CC1|FEDERAL AGENCIES, EACH MONTH    
20110113091338.000|20110113091341.000|CC1|BROADENING THE CIRCLE TO INCLUDE
20110113091341.000|20110113091341.000|CC1|MORE STAKEHOLDERS.              
20110113091341.000|20110113091344.000|CC1|WE LEARNED OF HER EFFORTS IN    
20110113091344.000|20110113091346.000|CC1|DELEGATION MEETINGS HERE IN     
20110113091346.000|20110113091348.000|CC1|WASHINGTON WHERE SHE ENLISTED   
20110113091348.000|20110113091351.000|CC1|ADDITIONAL SUPPORT LAST AUGUST. 
20110113091351.000|20110113091353.000|CC1|MUCHS A RESULT OF GABBY'S       
20110113091353.000|20110113091354.000|CC1|PERSISTENT EFFORTS, THE CONGRESS
20110113091354.000|20110113091356.000|CC1|ACTED, PROVIDING UNPRECEDENTED  
20110113091356.000|20110113091357.000|CC1|RESOURCES TO IMPROVE SECURITY IN
20110113091357.000|20110113091358.000|CC1|THE AREA.                       
20110113091358.000|20110113091401.000|CC1|GABBY LISTENED, SHE RESPONDED   
20110113091401.000|20110113091402.000|CC1|AND IN THE END CONGRESS         
20110113091402.000|20110113091404.000|CC1|RESPONDED AS WELL.              
20110113091404.000|20110113091406.000|CC1|WE ARE RESPONDING HERE TODAY BY 
20110113091406.000|20110113091407.000|CC1|GIVING THANKS FOR THE SERVICE OF
20110113091407.000|20110113091409.000|CC1|FEDERAL JUDGE JOHN ROLL AND GAVE
20110113091409.000|20110113091411.000|CC1|ZIMMERMAN FOR THE PUBLIC SERVICE
20110113091411.000|20110113091413.000|CC1|THEY HAVE RENDERED.             
20110113091413.000|20110113091415.000|CC1|WE ARE RESPONDING TODAY BY      
20110113091415.000|20110113091416.000|CC1|RECOGNIZING E HEROIC            
20110113091416.000|20110113091417.000|CC1|LIFE-SAVING EFFORTS OF PEOPLE   
20110113091417.000|20110113091419.000|CC1|LIKE DANIEL HERNANDEZ WHO       
20110113091419.000|20110113091422.000|CC1|DELIVERED AID TO CONGRESSMAN    
20110113091422.000|20110113091424.000|CC1|GIFFORDS, THOSE WHO TACKLED THE 
20110113091424.000|20110113091426.000|CC1|GUNMAN, TO DORWIN STODDARD, WHO 
20110113091426.000|20110113091428.000|CC1|SHIELDED HIS WIFE FROM THE      
20110113091428.000|20110113091430.000|CC1|GUNFIRE, SELFLESSLY GIVING HIS  
20110113091430.000|20110113091431.000|CC1|OWN LIFE THAT SHE MIGHT LIVE.   
20110113091431.000|20110113091433.000|CC1|WE ARE RESPONDING TODAY BY      
20110113091433.000|20110113091435.000|CC1|JOINING JOHN AND ROXANNE GREEN  
20110113091435.000|20110113091436.000|CC1|IN MOURNING THE LOSS OF THEIR   
20110113091436.000|20110113091438.000|CC1|9-YEAR-OLD DAUGHTER CHRISTINA,

20110113091439.000|20110113091442.000|CC1|FAMILIES OF DOROTHY MURRAY AND  
20110113091442.000|20110113091444.000|CC1|PHYLLIS SCHNECK.                
20110113091444.000|20110113091445.000|CC1|WE IN THE ARIZONA DELEGATION ARE
20110113091445.000|20110113091447.000|CC1|PROUD OF THE WONDERFUL STATE    
20110113091447.000|20110113091448.000|CC1|THAT WE TOGETHER WITH MORE THAN 
20110113091448.000|20110113091450.000|CC1|SIX MILLION OF OUR FRIENDS AND  
20110113091450.000|20110113091452.000|CC1|NEIGHBORS CALL HOME.

20110113091454.000|20110113091456.000|CC1|ACTIONS OF A LONE, CRAZED       
20110113091456.000|20110113091458.000|CC1|GUNMAN, BUT BY THE HEROISM AND  
20110113091458.000|20110113091501.000|CC1|BRAVERY OF THOSE WHO LEFT US ON

20110113091521.000|20110113091523.000|CC1|RECOGNIZED FOR THREE MINUTES.   
20110113091523.000|20110113091524.000|CC1|MR. LARSON: I THANK THE         
20110113091524.000|20110113091525.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN FROM ARIZONA, THANK   
20110113091525.000|20110113091528.000|CC1|YOU, MADAM SPEAKER.             
20110113091528.000|20110113091531.000|CC1|SHAKE PEER -- SHAKESPEARE TELLS 
20110113091531.000|20110113091537.000|CC1|US IN "OTHELLO, THAT WHEN AIGO  
20110113091537.000|20110113091543.000|CC1|WHISPERS MISTRUTHS IN THE EAR OF
20110113091543.000|20110113091545.000|CC1|OTHELLO, SOMETHING BEAUTIFUL    
20110113091545.000|20110113091549.000|CC1|DIES.                           
20110113091549.000|20110113091551.000|CC1|SOMETHING BEAUTIFUL DIED IN     
20110113091551.000|20110113091553.000|CC1|TUCSON, ARIZONA, THIS PAST      
20110113091553.000|20110113091557.000|CC1|SATURDAY.                       
20110113091557.000|20110113091600.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO CAME TO AN EVENT TO  
20110113091600.000|20110113091606.000|CC1|HEAR THEIR CONGRESSWOMAN SPEAK, 
20110113091606.000|20110113091609.000|CC1|ONE LITTLE GIRL, 9 YEARS OLD,   
20110113091609.000|20110113091613.000|CC1|ALL BEAUTIFUL, ALL CELEBRATING  
20110113091613.000|20110113091617.000|CC1|THE GREAT BEAUTY AND MANLESTY OF
20110113091617.000|20110113091619.000|CC1|OUR DEMOCRAT -- MAJESTY OF OUR  
20110113091619.000|20110113091625.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY PASSED ON THAT DAY.   
20110113091625.000|20110113091630.000|CC1|WHO KNOWS WHAT MISTRUTHS WERE   
20110113091630.000|20110113091634.000|CC1|BOUNCING AROUND IN THE HEAD OF  
20110113091634.000|20110113091637.000|CC1|THE ASSASSIN, WHO COULD KNOW    
20110113091637.000|20110113091640.000|CC1|THAT?                           
20110113091640.000|20110113091643.000|CC1|BUT SOMETHING BEAUTIFUL DIED.   
20110113091643.000|20110113091649.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY DIED JUST A LITTLE    
20110113091649.000|20110113091652.000|CC1|THAT DAY.                       
20110113091652.000|20110113091655.000|CC1|BUT BEAUTY HAS A WAY OF COMING  
20110113091655.000|20110113091657.000|CC1|BACK.                           
20110113091657.000|20110113091701.000|CC1|IT RESIDES IN PEOE LIKE         
20110113091701.000|20110113091702.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS.             
20110113091702.000|20110113091705.000|CC1|SHE EPITOMIZES ALL THAT IS GOOD 
20110113091705.000|20110113091709.000|CC1|AND RICH ABOUT SERVING IN THE   
20110113091709.000|20110113091710.000|CC1|UNITED STATES CONGRESS.         
20110113091710.000|20110113091716.000|CC1|FROM HER VERY DEMEANOR, TO HER  
20110113091716.000|20110113091718.000|CC1|GRACIOUSNESS, TO THE WAY SHE    
20110113091718.000|20110113091722.000|CC1|CARRIED HERSELF IN COMMITTEE    
20110113091722.000|20110113091726.000|CC1|WITH HER LEGISLATION AND HOW SHE
20110113091726.000|20110113091730.000|CC1|HELD FORTH WITH HER CONSTITUENTS
20110113091730.000|20110113091733.000|CC1|IN AN ACCOUNTABLE MANNER THAT   
20110113091733.000|20110113091736.000|CC1|HAS BECOME SO MUCH A FABRIC OF  
20110113091736.000|20110113091742.000|CC1|OUR DEMOCRACY, OUR CONGRESS ON  
20110113091742.000|20110113091746.000|CC1|THE CORNER.                     
20110113091746.000|20110113091750.000|CC1|SHE TRULY IS A BEAUTIFUL PERSON 
20110113091750.000|20110113091752.000|CC1|AND THAT BEAUTY HAD OTHERS      
20110113091752.000|20110113091753.000|CC1|RESPONDING THADAY WITH ACTS OF  
20110113091753.000|20110113091755.000|CC1|REMEMBER WISM THAT HAVE ALREADY 
20110113091755.000|20110113091757.000|CC1|BEEN RECOUNTED ON -- HEROISM    
20110113091757.000|20110113091758.000|CC1|THAT HAVE ALREADY BEEN RECOUNTED
20110113091758.000|20110113091759.000|CC1|ON THIS FLOOR, AND THAT BEAUTY  
20110113091759.000|20110113091802.000|CC1|LIES IN STATE WITH HER HUSBAND  
20110113091802.000|20110113091804.000|CC1|BY HER SIDE AND WITH THE FERVENT
20110113091804.000|20110113091808.000|CC1|PRAYERS OF A NATION AND HOPE,   
20110113091808.000|20110113091811.000|CC1|KNOWING AND FEELING CONFIDENT   
20110113091811.000|20110113091817.000|CC1|THAT SHE WILL RETURN FROM THIS  
20110113091817.000|20110113091822.000|CC1|AWFUL INCIDENT AND BE BACK HERE 
20110113091822.000|20110113091824.000|CC1|WITH US, GRACING US WITH HER    
20110113091824.000|20110113091829.000|CC1|BEAUTY AND DIGNITY AND VISION   
20110113091829.000|20110113091830.000|CC1|AND PURPOSE.                    
20110113091830.000|20110113091835.000|CC1|ONE OF HER LAST REMARKS WAS, IN 
20110113091835.000|20110113091838.000|CC1|SPEAKING TO MR. TROY GRAYSON,   
20110113091838.000|20110113091840.000|CC1|DIRECTOR OF HARVARD INSTITUTE OF
20110113091840.000|20110113091841.000|CC1|POLITICS, WAS TO SAY, I WOULD   
20110113091841.000|20110113091843.000|CC1|LOVE TO TALK ABOUT WHAT WE CAN  
20110113091843.000|20110113091846.000|CC1|DO TO PROMOTE CRITICISM,        
20110113091846.000|20110113091848.000|CC1|CENTRISM AND MODDERISM.         
20110113091848.000|20110113091851.000|CC1|I THINK WE NEED TO FIGURE OUT   
20110113091851.000|20110113091855.000|CC1|HOW TO TONE DOWN OUR RHETORIC   
20110113091855.000|20110113091857.000|CC1|AND THE PARTISANSHIP THAT EXISTS
20110113091857.000|20110113091859.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110113091859.000|20110113091900.000|CC1|WITH THAT I YIELD BACK THE      
20110113091900.000|20110113091901.000|CC1|BALANCE OF MY TIME.             
20110113091901.000|20110113091902.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: T      
20110113091902.000|20110113091903.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN'S TIME HAS EXPIRED.   
20110113091903.000|20110113091904.000|CC1|THE GENTLEMAN FROM ARIZONA,     
20110113091904.000|20110113091905.000|CC1|THERE -- MR. FLAKE.             
20110113091905.000|20110113091906.000|CC1|MR. FLAKE: I YIELD SUCH TIME AS 
20110113091906.000|20110113091907.000|CC1|HE MAY CONSUME TO THE GENTLEMAN 
20110113091907.000|20110113091908.000|CC1|FROM ARIZONA, MR. FRANKS.       
20110113091908.000|20110113091909.000|CC1|THSPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE      
20110113091909.000|20110113091910.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN FROM ARIZONA IS       
20110113091910.000|20110113091912.000|CC1|RECOGNIZED FOR SUCH TIME AS HE  
20110113091912.000|20110113091912.000|CC1|MAY CONSUME.                    
20110113091912.000|20110113091914.000|CC1|MR. FRANKS: AND I THANK THE     
20110113091914.000|20110113091916.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN.                      
20110113091916.000|20110113091918.000|CC1|MADAM SPEAKER, THE TRAGEDY THIS 
20110113091918.000|20110113091919.000|CC1|WE IN ARIZONA HAS BEEN A        
20110113091919.000|20110113091922.000|CC1|REMINDER TO ALL OF US OF THE    
20110113091922.000|20110113091924.000|CC1|BREVITY AND DELICATE NATURE OF  
20110113091924.000|20110113091926.000|CC1|THIS EARTHLY LIFE.              
20110113091926.000|20110113091928.000|CC1|IT IS MY PRAYER THIS MORNING    
20110113091928.000|20110113091931.000|CC1|THAT GOD WOULD GRANT ALL OF THE 
20110113091931.000|20110113091934.000|CC1|VICTIMS NAMED IN THIS RESOLUTION
20110113091934.000|20110113091935.000|CC1|AS WELL AS THE GRIEVING FAMILIES
20110113091935.000|20110113091938.000|CC1|AND LOVED ONES WHO ARE MOURNING 
20110113091938.000|20110113091939.000|CC1|THE LOSS OF THE SIX PRECIOUS    
20110113091939.000|20110113091943.000|CC1|LIVES THAT WERE TAKEN THAT DAY  
20110113091943.000|20110113091945.000|CC1|THE COMFORT, THE PEACE AND THE  
20110113091945.000|20110113091947.000|CC1|RESTORATION THAT ONLY HE CAN    
20110113091947.000|20110113091949.000|CC1|GIVE.                           
20110113091949.000|20110113091951.000|CC1|MADAM SPEAKER, IT HAPPENS THAT  
20110113091951.000|20110113091953.000|CC1|THE ONLY ONE OF THOSE VICTIMS   
20110113091953.000|20110113091956.000|CC1|THAT I KNEW WELL PERSONALLY WAS 
20110113091956.000|20110113092000.000|CC1|OUR OWN GABBY GIFFORDS.         
20110113092000.000|20110113092001.000|CC1|MADAM SPEAKER, GABBY AND I ARE  
20110113092001.000|20110113092005.000|CC1|FROM DIFFERENT PARTIES AND ON   
20110113092005.000|20110113092007.000|CC1|PAST AND HAPPIER DAYS, MANY IN  
20110113092007.000|20110113092008.000|CC1|ARIZONA WOULD OFTEN JOKE ABOUT  
20110113092008.000|20110113092012.000|CC1|THE DIFFERENCES IN OUR POLITICS.
20110113092012.000|20110113092013.000|CC1|BUT I CAN TESTIFY TO YOU THIS   
20110113092013.000|20110113092015.000|CC1|MORNING, MADAM SPEAKER, THAT IN 
20110113092015.000|20110113092018.000|CC1|THE FOUR YEARS THAT I HAVE KNOWN
20110113092018.000|20110113092020.000|CC1|GABBY GIFFORDS, THERE HAS NEVER 
20110113092020.000|20110113092025.000|CC1|BEEN ONE UNKIND OR EVEN TERS    
20110113092025.000|20110113092028.000|CC1|WORD PASSED BETWEEN US.         
20110113092028.000|20110113092031.000|CC1|GABBY GIFFORDS IS A PRECIOUS,   
20110113092031.000|20110113092034.000|CC1|WARM, CARING, DECENT HUMAN BEING
20110113092034.000|20110113092036.000|CC1|WHOSE WARMTH AND CHARM TOUCHED  
20110113092036.000|20110113092039.000|CC1|THE HEARTS OF ALL WHO KNOW HER. 
20110113092039.000|20110113092041.000|CC1|AND THE TESTIMONY OF HER LIFE   
20110113092041.000|20110113092044.000|CC1|AND RK IS PROOF THAT TRUE       
20110113092044.000|20110113092045.000|CC1|TOLERANCE IS NOT IN PRETENDING  
20110113092045.000|20110113092048.000|CC1|THAT WE HAVE NO DIFFERENCES.    
20110113092048.000|20110113092050.000|CC1|IT IS BEING KIND AND DECENT TO  
20110113092050.000|20110113092052.000|CC1|EACH OTHER IN SPITE OF THOSE    
20110113092052.000|20110113092053.000|CC1|DIFFERENCES.                    
20110113092053.000|20110113092056.000|CC1|AND IT STRIKES ME AS MORE THAN A
20110113092056.000|20110113092058.000|CC1|POIGNANT COINCIDENCE THAT ONLY  
20110113092058.000|20110113092101.000|CC1|DAYS BEFORE THE TRAGEDY WE ALL  
20110113092101.000|20110113092103.000|CC1|LISTENED TO GABBY GIFFORDS AS   
20110113092103.000|20110113092105.000|CC1|SHE STOOD AT THIS VERY PODIUM   
20110113092105.000|20110113092108.000|CC1|AND READ THE WORDS OF THE       
20110113092108.000|20110113092109.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION'S FIRST AMENDMENT  
20110113092109.000|20110113092112.000|CC1|WHICH PROTECTS THE RIGHT OF THE 
20110113092112.000|20110113092115.000|CC1|PEOPLE TO PEACEABLY ASSEMBLE.   
20110113092115.000|20110113092116.000|CC1|AND THEN ONLY DAYS LATER, MADAM 
20110113092116.000|20110113092120.000|CC1|SPEAKER, AS SHE WAS EXERCISING  
20110113092120.000|20110113092122.000|CC1|THAT RIGHT AND FAITHFULLY DOING 
20110113092122.000|20110113092124.000|CC1|HER JOB AS A MEMBER OF THE      
20110113092124.000|20110113092128.000|CC1|UNITED STATES CONGRESS, ONE     
20110113092128.000|20110113092129.000|CC1|BEREST OF HEART HUMAN COMPASSION
20110113092129.000|20110113092131.000|CC1|AND RESPECT FOR INNOCENT HUMAN  
20110113092131.000|20110113092133.000|CC1|LIFE MINDLESSLY SHATTERED HER   
20110113092133.000|20110113092135.000|CC1|LIFE AND THE LES OF SO MANY     
20110113092135.000|20110113092137.000|CC1|OTHERS AROUND HER.              
20110113092137.000|20110113092140.000|CC1|.                               
20110113092140.000|20110113092141.000|CC1|MADAM SPEAKER, THE LAST WORDS I 
20110113092141.000|20110113092143.000|CC1|HAD WITH GABBYIFFORDS WERE      
20110113092143.000|20110113092145.000|CC1|SPOKEN NOT 10 FEET FROM THIS    
20110113092145.000|20110113092147.000|CC1|PODIUM WHEN WE EXCHANGED SIMPLE 
20110113092147.000|20110113092150.000|CC1|WITH YOU GENUINE AND HEARTFELT  
20110113092150.000|20110113092151.000|CC1|WORDS AND BEST WISHES FOR THE   
20110113092151.000|20110113092154.000|CC1|NEW YEAR AND THE NEW CONGRESS.  
20110113092154.000|20110113092155.000|CC1|MADAM SPEAKER, I WILL TELL YOU  
20110113092155.000|20110113092156.000|CC1|THAT WHEN I HEARD THE NEWS OF   
20110113092156.000|20110113092159.000|CC1|THIS TRAGEDY AND THE FALSE      
20110113092159.000|20110113092202.000|CC1|REPORT THAT GABBY HAD DIED, I   
20110113092202.000|20110113092204.000|CC1|FELT SUCH AN OVERWHELMING SENSE 
20110113092204.000|20110113092206.000|CC1|OF GRIEF IN MY SOUL TO THINK    
20110113092206.000|20110113092208.000|CC1|THAT THOSE WERE THE LAST WORDS  
20110113092208.000|20110113092210.000|CC1|I WOULD EVER SPEAK TO HER.      
20110113092210.000|20110113092212.000|CC1|AND IT WAS A REMINDER TO ME,    
20110113092212.000|20110113092216.000|CC1|MADAM SPEAKER, OF THE BREVITY   
20110113092216.000|20110113092217.000|CC1|AND PRESHNESS OF HUMAN LIFE AND 
20110113092217.000|20110113092218.000|CC1|FREEDOM AND JUST HOW IMPORTANT  
20110113092218.000|20110113092221.000|CC1|IT REALLY IS FOR EACH OF US TO  
20110113092221.000|20110113092224.000|CC1|SEIZE EVERY MOMENT AND TO SPEAK 
20110113092224.000|20110113092225.000|CC1|KIND AND LOVING WORDS TO EACH   
20110113092225.000|20110113092227.000|CC1|OTHER WHILE WE STILL CAN.       
20110113092227.000|20110113092228.000|CC1|SO, MADAM SPEAKER, IT ISY       
20110113092228.000|20110113092232.000|CC1|PRAYER THAT GOD WOULD COME --   
20110113092232.000|20110113092233.000|CC1|WOULD COMFORT THE GIFFORDS

20110113092241.000|20110113092244.000|CC1|WOULD SOMEDAY VERY SOON RETURN

20110113092259.000|20110113092259.000|CC1|PASTOR.

20110113092343.000|20110113092346.000|CC1|OUR DEMOCRACY, SO TRAGICALLY    
20110113092346.000|20110113092347.000|CC1|LOST THEIR LIVES IN A SENSELESS 
20110113092347.000|20110113092350.000|CC1|ACT OF VIOLENCE LAST SATURDAY.  
20110113092350.000|20110113092352.000|CC1|I ALSO WANT TO PAY TRIBUTE TO   
20110113092352.000|20110113092354.000|CC1|THOSE 14 ARIZONANS, INCLUDING   
20110113092354.000|20110113092358.000|CC1|OUR DEDICATED AND BELOVED

20110113092410.000|20110113092412.000|CC1|TO USE THEIR SUNDAY MORNING TO  
20110113092412.000|20110113092414.000|CC1|PARTICATE IN A PUBLIC EVENT     
20110113092414.000|20110113092415.000|CC1|TO MAKE THEIR GOVERNMENT        
20110113092415.000|20110113092419.000|CC1|BETTER.                         
20110113092419.000|20110113092420.000|CC1|RECOVERING AT DIFFERENT PACES

20110113092437.000|20110113092437.000|CC1|COVERED.                        
20110113092437.000|20110113092438.000|CC1|GABBY CONTINUES TO FIGHT,       
20110113092438.000|20110113092440.000|CC1|LITERALLY FIGHT, EVERY MINUTE,  
20110113092440.000|20110113092442.000|CC1|FOR HER LIFE.                   
20110113092442.000|20110113092444.000|CC1|AND WE ARE ALL REACHING TOWARD  
20110113092444.000|20110113092446.000|CC1|OUR GOD IN PRAYER,              
20110113092446.000|20110113092450.000|CC1|CONTEMPTATION, --               
20110113092450.000|20110113092453.000|CC1|CONTEMPLATION, AND WHISPERS, IN 
20110113092453.000|20110113092454.000|CC1|A UNIFIED EFFORT TO BRING ABOUT 
20110113092454.000|20110113092456.000|CC1|A QUICK RECOVERY AND RETURN TO  
20110113092456.000|20110113092457.000|CC1|US HERE IN THIS HOUSE OF        
20110113092457.000|20110113092458.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES.                
20110113092458.000|20110113092503.000|CC1|THOSE WHO PERISED, DOROTHY      
20110113092503.000|20110113092505.000|CC1|MORRIS, GABE ZIMMERMAN,         
20110113092505.000|20110113092508.000|CC1|CHRISTINA TAYLOR GREEN, DORWAN  
20110113092508.000|20110113092510.000|CC1|STODDARD, AND JOHN ROLL WILL BE 
20110113092510.000|20110113092512.000|CC1|MISSED BY THEIR FAMILIES, THEIR 
20110113092512.000|20110113092513.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES, THEIR FRIENDS, AND  
20110113092513.000|20110113092516.000|CC1|ALL ARIZONANS.                  
20110113092516.000|20110113092516.000|CC1|PHYLLIS SCHNECK WAS DESCRIBED   
20110113092516.000|20110113092519.000|CC1|BY HER NEW JERSEY HOMETOWN      
20110113092519.000|20110113092521.000|CC1|PAPER AS A LIFELONG             
20110113092521.000|20110113092523.000|CC1|CONSERVATIVE.                   
20110113092523.000|20110113092526.000|CC1|YET SHE WAS THERE TO SEEK GABBY 
20110113092526.000|20110113092530.000|CC1|BECAUSE SHE ADMIRED HER.        
20110113092530.000|20110113092532.000|CC1|THIS IS A PERFECT EXAMPLE OF    
20110113092532.000|20110113092534.000|CC1|SOMEONE WHO WANTED TO STEP      
20110113092534.000|20110113092538.000|CC1|BEYOND THE CURRENT VITRIOL IN   
20110113092538.000|20110113092539.000|CC1|MODERN DAY POLITICS AND BRING   
20110113092539.000|20110113092540.000|CC1|US TOGETHER.                    
20110113092540.000|20110113092542.000|CC1|DOROTHY MORRIS WAS MARRIED TO A 
20110113092542.000|20110113092544.000|CC1|FORMER MARINE CORPS PILOT WHO   
20110113092544.000|20110113092546.000|CC1|WAS ALSO WOUNDED AND            
20110113092546.000|20110113092546.000|CC1|RECOVERING.                     
20110113092546.000|20110113092548.000|CC1|WE ALL KNOW THE PATRIOTISM AND  
20110113092548.000|20110113092551.000|CC1|LOVE OF COUNTRY EVERY SPOUSE OF 
20110113092551.000|20110113092552.000|CC1|A MARINE EXHIBITS.              
20110113092552.000|20110113092556.000|CC1|AND SHE WAS NO EXCEPTION.       
20110113092556.000|20110113092559.000|CC1|GABE ZIMMERMAN WAS ONE OF US.   
20110113092559.000|20110113092601.000|CC1|A DEDICATED STAFF MEMBER TO     
20110113092601.000|20110113092602.000|CC1|GABBY.                          
20110113092602.000|20110113092604.000|CC1|IT IS SAID HE LITALLY LIVED     
20110113092604.000|20110113092606.000|CC1|TO SERVE HIS COMMUNITY.         
20110113092606.000|20110113092608.000|CC1|SADLY HE PERISHED BUT HE        
20110113092608.000|20110113092610.000|CC1|PERISHED FULFILLING HIS CALLING 
20110113092610.000|20110113092611.000|CC1|AND DOING WHAT HE LOVED,        
20110113092611.000|20110113092616.000|CC1|HELPING THE PEOPLE OF HIS TOWN. 
20110113092616.000|20110113092620.000|CC1|CHRISTINA TAYLOR GREEN WAS JUST 
20110113092620.000|20110113092621.000|CC1|START HER POLITICAL CAREER.     
20110113092621.000|20110113092623.000|CC1|SHE HAD JUST BEEN ELECTED TO    
20110113092623.000|20110113092626.000|CC1|HER SCHOOL STUDENT COUNCIL AND  
20110113092626.000|20110113092628.000|CC1|WANTED TO COME SEE AT THE       
20110113092628.000|20110113092629.000|CC1|HIGHEST LEVEL.                  
20110113092629.000|20110113092631.000|CC1|SHE WANTED TO SEE A PRO SO SHE  
20110113092631.000|20110113092633.000|CC1|CAME TO SEE GABBY.              
20110113092633.000|20110113092635.000|CC1|SHE WAS A SPECIAL LITTLE GIRL   
20110113092635.000|20110113092637.000|CC1|WHO KEPT REACHING FOR THE STARS 
20110113092637.000|20110113092640.000|CC1|AND POLITICS, DANCE, BASEBALL,  
20110113092640.000|20110113092645.000|CC1|AND WHATEVER HER HEART DESIRED. 
20110113092645.000|20110113092647.000|CC1|DORWAN STODDARD DIED SHIELDING  
20110113092647.000|20110113092648.000|CC1|HIS WIFE WHO WAS ALSO WOUNDED   
20110113092648.000|20110113092651.000|CC1|BUT EXPECTED TO RECOVER.        
20110113092651.000|20110113092653.000|CC1|FOLLOWING THEIR REGULAR         
20110113092653.000|20110113092656.000|CC1|SATURDAY OUTING, DORWAN BROUGHT 
20110113092656.000|20110113092659.000|CC1|HIS WIFE TO GABBY BECAUSE       
20110113092659.000|20110113092700.000|CC1|REPORTEDLY SHE WANTED TO TELL   
20110113092700.000|20110113092701.000|CC1|GABBY WHAT A GOOD JOB SHE WAS   
20110113092701.000|20110113092703.000|CC1|DOING.                          
20110113092703.000|20110113092705.000|CC1|HIGH SCHOOL SWEETHEARTS WHO     
20110113092705.000|20110113092706.000|CC1|WERE RECONNECTED AFTER MANY     
20110113092706.000|20110113092708.000|CC1|YEARS APART, THEY WERE A PILLAR 
20110113092708.000|20110113092711.000|CC1|OF THEIR CHURCH COMMUNITY AND   
20110113092711.000|20110113092714.000|CC1|WE KNOW MAZIE WILL CONTINUE ON. 
20110113092714.000|20110113092716.000|CC1|SADDENED AND BURDENED, BUT      
20110113092716.000|20110113092720.000|CC1|HOPEFULLY NOT BROKEN.           
20110113092720.000|20110113092721.000|CC1|FINALLY, JUDGE ROLL, HAD BEEN   
20110113092721.000|20110113092722.000|CC1|WORKING WITH GABBY AND SEVERAL  
20110113092722.000|20110113092724.000|CC1|OF US IN THE DELEGATION FOR THE 
20110113092724.000|20110113092726.000|CC1|PAST SEVERAL MONTHS TRYING TO   
20110113092726.000|20110113092728.000|CC1|MAKE THE COURTS IN ARIZONA MORE 
20110113092728.000|20110113092729.000|CC1|EFFICIENT AND MORE RESPONSIVE   
20110113092729.000|20110113092732.000|CC1|TO BOTH THE VICTIM AND THE      
20110113092732.000|20110113092733.000|CC1|ACCUSED.                        
20110113092733.000|20110113092735.000|CC1|I KNEW HIM TO BE A FAIR,        
20110113092735.000|20110113092737.000|CC1|DEDICATED, CHARMING             
20110113092737.000|20110113092738.000|CC1|PROFESSIONAL AND LOYAL PERSON.  
20110113092738.000|20110113092740.000|CC1|HE LOVED HIS FAMILY, HE LOVED

20110113092755.000|20110113092755.000|CC1|WOUNDED.

20110113092906.000|20110113092912.000|CC1|SCHWEIKERT.

20110113092916.000|20110113092918.000|CC1|IS WITH HEAVY HEART THAT I COME

20110113092924.000|20110113092927.000|CC1|THAT TOOK THE LIVES OF JOHN M.  
20110113092927.000|20110113092930.000|CC1|ROLL, CHRISTINE TAYLOR GREEN,   
20110113092930.000|20110113092933.000|CC1|DORWAN STODDARD, DOROTHY

20110113092939.000|20110113092941.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN GABBY GIFFORDS.     
20110113092941.000|20110113092943.000|CC1|IT WAS JUST LAST WEEK THAT MY   
20110113092943.000|20110113092944.000|CC1|WIFE AND I HAD THE OPPORTUNITY

20110113092948.000|20110113092949.000|CC1|CEREMONIAL SWEARING-IN.         
20110113092949.000|20110113092952.000|CC1|AND AS SO MANY OF YOU KNOW, OUR 
20110113092952.000|20110113092955.000|CC1|INTERACTIONS WITH HER WERE

20110113092958.000|20110113092959.000|CC1|WERE SETTING UP OUR FRESHMAN    
20110113092959.000|20110113093000.000|CC1|OFFICE.                         
20110113093000.000|20110113093002.000|CC1|WE TOOK A FEW PHOTOS, WE TALKED 
20110113093002.000|20110113093004.000|CC1|ABOUT WAYS WE COULD WORK        
20110113093004.000|20110113093006.000|CC1|TOGETHER, AND OF COURSE WE      
20110113093006.000|20110113093007.000|CC1|ENGAGED IN THE BANTER AND       
20110113093007.000|20110113093010.000|CC1|TEASING OF ARIZONA'S FTE        
20110113093010.000|20110113093014.000|CC1|RIVALRY, A.S.U. VS. U. OF A.    
20110113093014.000|20110113093016.000|CC1|GABBY TAKES ENORMOUS PRIDE IN

20110113093018.000|20110113093020.000|CC1|COMMUNITIES OF STHERN

20110113093026.000|20110113093030.000|CC1|WE DEEPLY APPRECIATE THE GIFT

20110113093032.000|20110113093034.000|CC1|OF US HERE IN WASHINGTON AND
